channel.title: Hainesnoids's Blog of Awesomeness
channel.description: The best blog with all the awesomeness included.

item.title: Has trump caused a pre-order drought in the US?
item.description: Nintendo delayed switch 2 pre-orders in the US due to the tariffs, and Framework has recently done the same thing for a similar reason (keep in mind, pre-orders for both were to open on the same day). If this means pre-orders for both open up on my birthday that's fine, but idk about everything else.
item.author: hainesnoids

item.title: upcoming video might be delayed
item.description: i cannot get my voice to sound good, so next week's video might get delayed. but hey the script and thumbnail are done so its not THAT bad.
item.author: hainesnoids

item.title: welcome to the blog!
item.description: i plan to use this a lot, so yeah, uuh, expect that.
item.author: hainesnoids
